BreadcrumbHomeNPDES Permits Around the NationNorth Carolina NPDES PermitsIn North Carolina, EPA issues NPDES permits within tribal lands of the Eastern Band of Cherokee Indians (see table below). EPA has delegated authority to issue other NPDES permits to the North Carolina Department of Environmental Quality.For state-issued permits, visitNorth Carolina Dept. of Environmental Quality NPDES PermittingClick on the facility/permit name in the table below to view permit documents.NPDES Permits Issued by EPA in North CarolinaLocationFacility or Permit NamePermit NumberPermit StatusEffective DateExpiration DateCherokeeCherokee Trout FarmNC0054992Final2017-06-102022-06-09CherokeeEBCI Trout HatcheryNC0052451Final2017-06-102022-06-09CherokeeCherokee Wastewater Treatment PlantNC0052469Final2025-05-012030-04-30Contact Us About NPDES Permits Around the Nationto ask a question, provide feedback, or report a problem.Last updated on May 5, 2025
